name: Abyss Memory Fallen Angel and the Path of Magic
storyline: The world of Abyss Memory: In a world amongst the heavens, a curious, little angel named Mariel spent all her days reading through the vast collection of books in the grand library. One day, while browsing the library's collection, she came across a very peculiar book with naught but the title, "Abyss" printed on its cover. The pages within were blank. In truth, Mariel had heard the name, "Abyss" from the elder angels before. It was the name of the world below the heavens. Intrigued by the notion, her curiosity grew until she couldn't resist any longer. She ventured out to the heavenly bridge to sneak a peek over the edge, into the world known as "Abyss."
summary: Worldwide Drawing Adventure Challenge Strive forward with easy-to-learn controls. Drawing action! Protect, connect, aid, and guide with your mouse. Mariel will continue to walk in a single direction. Draw paths with your mouse and aid Mariel on her adventure through the Abyss.
